WorkItem.ClosedComment: Submitted fix for this issue in build 36147
WorkItem.Description: No matter what level I choose for my target, from 80 to 83, Rawr tells me I need 8% hit to be yellow capped.
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSWarr] Target level does not affect yellow hit cap

Comments.Message: We never bothered setting it up to change the hit/expertise caps based on boss level. Primarily that box just changes your crit percentage
It would probably be simple to adjust this, though. It's just 1% per level.  Same level - 5%.  +1 - 6%.  +2 - 7%.  +3 - 8%.

This would be a useful feature, as I tend to keep three tanking sets: 1 for survival, 1 for trash threat, and 1 for boss threat.  It's not 1% per level, though; it's 5% for a lvl 70 mob, 5.2% for lvl 71, 5.4% for lvl 72, and 8% for lvl 73 (http://www.wowwiki.com/Hit)
(and yes, I realize this is in the DPSWar section, but what I said could apply to dpsing as well)
You're exactly right, Salion - I'm an idiot.  xD  Though it doesn't have to do with which level it is (70/80), just that it's relative to your level.
Yeah, that's true.  For some reason I was using levels from the wrong expansion, and assuming you were level 70.  Heh.  I must have been up to late.
I don't know how this one slipped by, guys.  It definitely should be using this based on target level.  I'll get it fixed as soon as I can, work's been busy lately
